###Get Data
```{r}
library(faraway)
attach(teengamb)
str(teengamb)
```

###Check for Missing value
```{r sum}
sum(is.na(teengamb))
```
There is no missing value in the dataset

###Boxplot of gamble expense by verbal score and sex
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
qplot(factor(verbal), gamble, data=teengamb, geom="boxplot")+geom_boxplot(aes(fill = factor(sex)))
```
